# Shard UO D&D â€” Jekyll site (Fantasy theme)

This is a ready-to-use Jekyll site tailored for an Ultima Online shard inspired by Dungeons & Dragons.
It is configured to work with GitHub Pages (uses the `github-pages` gem).

## How to use locally

1. Install Ruby + Bundler.
2. From project folder:
```bash
bundle install
bundle exec jekyll serve
```
3. Open http://localhost:4000

## Deploy to GitHub Pages

- If repository is `username.github.io` just push to `main` branch.
- Otherwise enable Pages in Settings and set source to `main` / root.
